title: B-Daman.Crossfire.S01E14.720p.WEBRip.AAC2.0.H.264
description:
B-Daman Crossfire - Season 1 - Episode 14 (WEBRip - 720p)
---------------------------------------------------------

Riki Ryugasaki, a schoolboy who lives in the town of East City in the year 20XX,
can be a bit of an airhead at times, has a lively personality and dreams of being
an adventurer when he grows up. When a friend and classmate named Sumi Inaba takes
him to a B-Daman event, Riki's interest is sparked. His curiosity deepens when he
hears an urban legend about a secret B-Daman tournament that is open only to a
select group of players. While Riki remains a bit skeptical, he cannot resist
the urge to investigate the mystery behind B-Daman.

Produced by TV Tokyo and d-rights.

 <a href="
http://img571.imageshack.us/img571/8819/zg4u.png" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://img571.imageshack.us/img571/8819/zg4u.png</a>

The disaster with the B-Crystal has made the existence of Crossfire known to the
public, so Riki and the other Crossfire B-Shots have become overnight celebrities.
A new tournament called the GP Series will be held to decide who is worthy of
claiming the Dragon King that the B-Crystal's energy will awaken. The competition
is open to all those who wish to compete. Much excitement is in store for the
B-Shots as the preliminaries begin...
